dct_title_s: A view of the city and port of Joppa at present called Jaffa
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, settlements, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of structures, people, and ships.
"P. S46" -- top right corner ; "Vol. I. 2d. Gath. Y." -- bottom right corner.
Appears in Calmet's A historical, critical, geographical ... dictionary of the Holy Bible. London, 1732, vol. I.
